00036 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00037 require_once('../lib/view.php');
00038 
00039 class Spamd extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'spamd';
00042     public $Layout= 'spamd';
00043     
00044     function Spamd()
00045     {
00046         $this->LogsHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Spamd logs connections from spam sources and greylisted clients. Also recorded is length of time the client remained connected to spamd.');
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 $View= new Spamd();
00051 
00060 function ParseSpamdDBLine($logline, &$cols)
00061 {
00062     global $Re_Ip;
00063 
00064     $re_srcip= "($Re_Ip)";
00065     $re_num= '(\d+)';
00066 
00067     //WHITE|89.37.208.82|||1173738113|1173739941|1176851242|3|1
00068     $re= "/^WHITE\|$re_srcip\|\|\|$re_num\|$re_num\|$re_num\|$re_num\|$re_num$/";
00069     if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00070         $cols['IP']= $match[1];
00071         $cols['First']= date('d.m.Y H:i', $match[2]);
00072         $cols['Listed']= date('d.m.Y H:i', $match[3]);
00073         $cols['Expire']= date('d.m.Y H:i', $match[4]);
00074         $cols['#Blocked']= $match[5];
00075         $cols['#Passed']= $match[6];
00076     }
00077 
00078     $re_domain= '([^|]+)';
00079     $re_email= '([^|]+)';
00080 
00081     //GREY|83.13.153.59|mail.optimeyes.com|<rifling@optimeyes.com>|<info@comixpbx.com>|1176311682|1176326082|1176326082|1|0
00082     $re= "/^GREY\|$re_srcip\|$re_domain\|$re_email\|$re_email\|$re_num\|$re_num\|$re_num\|$re_num\|$re_num$/";
00083     if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00084         $cols['IP']= $match[1];
00085         $cols['From']= wordwrap(str_replace(array('<', '>'), '', $match[3]), 30, '<br />', TRUE);
00086         $cols['To']= wordwrap(str_replace(array('<', '>'), '', $match[4]), 30, '<br />', TRUE);
00087         $cols['First']= date('d.m.Y H:i', $match[5]);
00088         $cols['Listed']= date('d.m.Y H:i', $match[6]);
00089         $cols['Expire']= date('d.m.Y H:i', $match[7]);
00090         $cols['#Blocked']= $match[8];
00091         $cols['#Passed']= $match[9];
00092     }
00093     $cols['Log']= '';
00094 }
00095 
00101 function PrintSpamdDBLine($logline, $linenum)
00102 {
00103     ParseSpamdDBLine($logline, $cols);
00104 
00105     echo '<tr>';
00106     PrintLogCols($linenum, $cols);
00107     echo '</tr>';
00108 }
